name: QuizPedia
author: quizpedia

sections.description: Embed quizzes from QuizPedia.com on your blog
sections.installation:
1. Upload quizpedia.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can I embed both quizzes and cards

Yes. In the settings panel you can choose if you want to embed quizzes fully or simply as a card that links to the quiz
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Updated for wordpress 4.1

1.0.1

  • Fixes support for new QuizPedia url formats

1.0

  • Support for both quizzes and cards added

short_description: Embed QuizPedia.com quizzes easily on your blog
description: Embed quizzes from QuizPedia.com on your blog

upgrade_notice.1.0.1: This version fixes crashes caused by new QuizPedia url format strategy

The resulting embed on the page
